description: Percentage of filesystem space used for each mounted device

targets.query: ((node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="localhost:9100", job="node_exporter", device!~"rootfs"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance="localhost:9100", job="node_exporter", device!~"rootfs"}) / node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="localhost:9100", job="node_exporter", device!~"rootfs"}) * 100
